doc.title: Ibikorwa vyo hanze
doc.description: Iyo ukanda kuri link, urashobora kumenyesha servisi yo hanze ko link yakanzwe Ushobora gukoresha iyo nzira nimba ukeneye guhindura umucukumbuzi kugira ngo ukoreshe.

service.title: Ukeneye serivisi yo hanze kugira ngo ushire mu ngiro iyi nzira, turatanga verisiyo ya beta ya serivisi
service.linkExplain: Ushobora gukuraho porogarama ihuye n’ivyo ukoresha bivanye n’ingene ukoresha. Ntivyemejwe ko ishobora gukora neza munsi ya sisitemu zose Niwahura n'ingorane, niwaba ushobora gutahura ururimi rwa porogarama {{0}}, ushobora gukuraho kode y'inkomoko maze ukayikoranya wewe nyene.

sendParams.title: Iyo guhuza bikanda, ikintu kizorungikwa hanze hakoreshejwe {{0}}, kirimwo ibi bikurikira:
